byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN and AURELIEN BREEDEN

abstract: Authorities say French native was third attacker at Bataclan, Paris, concert hall where 90 people were killed by terrorists; mother of assailant Foued Mohamed-Aggad, who had left in 2013 to fight in Syria, alerted police after receiving text message suggesting her son had died taking part in attacks.
lead_paragraph: The assailant is said to have been a 23-year-old from the Strasbourg area in northeastern France who left for Syria with a group of would-be jihadists in late 2013.

headline.main: Third Assailant in Bataclan Paris Attack Was a Frenchman

snippet: The assailant is said to have been a 23-year-old from the Strasbourg area in northeastern France who left for Syria with a group of would-be jihadists in late 2013.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
